review: Thank you. This USB 2.0 Gamepad for PC is a fantastic value for the price. It works seamlessly with my Windows system and is very easy to set up. The controller feels comfortable in my hands, and the vibration feature adds to the gaming experience. While some users have mentioned issues with the D-pad, I haven't experienced any significant problems. Overall, it's a great choice for retro gaming and emulators. Highly recommended!
